Question: Altos Radar CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Altos Radar

Product: Altos V Series 4D Imaging Radar

- World-first non-FPGA 4-chip cascade design based on TI TDA4
- Generates high-quality point clouds for autonomous vehicles
- Altos RF Series offers cost-effective 4D imaging radar solution
- Priced at half the cost of similar models with onboard processors
- Vision for future cost-efficient products including 2-chip cascaded and 4TX-4RX Corner Radar
- High-performance 4D millimeter-wave RADAR meets booming demand
- Projected market growth to $8 billion by 2027
- Notable investors include Hesai Technology CEO David (Yifan) Li, ZhenFund, and Monad Ventures
- Founded one year ago, with a highly skilled team rooted in autonomous driving and experiences in hardware, RF design, signal processing, compute optimization, and radar perception
Summary_cn:
安图斯雷达

产品：Altos V系列4D成像雷达

- 基于TI TDA4开发的世界首款非FPGA 4芯片级联设计
- 为自动驾驶汽车生成高质量的点云
- Altos RF系列提供经济实惠的4D成像雷达解决方案
- 售价为同类型号配备处理器的一半
- 未来计划推出成本效益更高的2芯片级联和4TX-4RX角雷达等产品
- 高性能4D毫米波雷达满足不断增长的市场需求
- 预计市场规模将在2027年达到80亿美元
- 著名投资者包括和赫塞科技首席执行官David (Yifan) Li、真格基金和Monad Ventures
- 成立一年，团队在自动驾驶领域拥有丰富经验，涵盖硬件、射频设计、信号处理、计算优化和雷达感知等领域具备高超技能
